body.p:
Paducah Ky. May 20th 1862
Frankfort Ky.
His Excl B Maggofin
Dear Sir
I visited Col Noble's head quarters on to day in obedience to my promise when arrested at Marion, had an interview with him and arranged the dificulty satisfactorily.
The interferance reported to you some days ago was the result of a misapprehension of the laws of our state and perhap some inacuracy of report as to proceding in Court.
He gives me assurances I shall not be interrupted in future at any of my courts

I have the ^honor^ to be
most respectfully
your obdt Servt
W. P. Fowler
